attributes.action: Award Captain Tom Moore for his amazing one man walk for our NHS
attributes.additional_details:
To walk 100 laps around your garden is a lot for anyone but for a 99 year old man it is beyond amazing.
Celebrities get them for doing nothing well I think Captain Tom deserves a knighthood
attributes.background: Please award a knighthood to Captain Tom he is a war hero and an amazing inspirational figure to the younger generation of today

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
